summary:
Judah - Working Dog - German Shepherd Dog Follower. 
** Requires Dawnguard**
descriptionHtml:
[FONT=Book Antiqua]

[center] [color=#E46C0A] [size=8] - J U D A H - [/size] [/color] [/center]
[center] [size=5] - Working Line German Shepherd - [/size] [/center] 

[center][img]http://img203.imageshack.us/img203/5558/versionsplash.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/2510/fixedshinytextures.jpg[/img][/center]

[center] [size=5] [color=#E46C0A] [b] - DESCRIPTION - [/b] [/color] [/size] [/center] 

[size=3]
German Shepherd Follower named Judah!

Lvl: 33 / Aggressive 
Strong, Loyal, and FAST!
- Essential. So he cannot die! :)
- Increased Knock-Down Chance. True Police Dog!
- Increased Attack Power in v1.01!
- Fixed Shiny Textures in v1.02!

Commands:
With me, Boy! - Judah Follows
Stay - Judah Stays
Go Home, Judah! - Judah will return to Breezehome location
[/size]

[center] [color=#E46C0A] [size=5] [b] - LOCATION - [/b] [/size] [/color]
[size=3] [/center]
He\'s waiting right in front of your Breezehome in Whiterun!
[/size]

[center] [color=#E46C0A] [size=5] [b] - INSTALL - [/b] [/size] [/color] [/center]

[size=3]
Please extract .RAR to Skyrim Data Folder
Enable .ESP
[/size]

[center] [color=#E46C0A] [size=5] [b] - UNINSTALL - [/b] [/size] [/color] [/center]

[size=3]
Remove the files originally extracted to the Data Folder.
Disable/Remove .ESP 
[/size]

[center] [color=#E46C0A] [size=5] [b] - KNOWN ISSUES - [/b] [/size] [/color] [/center] 

[size=3]
* Not compatible with UFO Mod yet. - Being worked.
* May have to set animal follower count to 0 to talk.
* Fixed Data Folder Organization.
[/size]

Thanks _ Please Respond and REPORT any errors.

[center] ~ Thanks and ENJOY! ~ [/center]
[/font]
author: WolfGrey84
